page.title: 17FARMING
page.content: The farms in the area range in size from 3O acres to 7OO acres.The crops grown are: barley; wheat; peas; potatoes; oats and oil seed rape.Grass is grown for animals and hay. The animals kept are: sheep; horses and bullocks. In the Meopham area the farms have a lot of machinery. This includes combine harvesters, ploughs, seed drills, harrows, balers, sub_soilers, cultivators, rotavator rollers, corn blowers, hay turners, sprayers, potato planters and scatters, fertiliser distributors, trailers, mowers, hay_making machinery, tractors and other tractor powered machines. Farmers have up to three full_time workers and sometimes the farmers' wives help. There are about lO farms in the area.
